mapper.sql:
FROM memberAddr a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND addr LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND addr_detail LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND zip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.div_addr ,a.addr_defaultNy ,a.addr ,a.addr_detail ,a.zip ,a.DelNy ,a.memberAddrLat ,a.memberAddrLng
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.div_addr ,a.addr_defaultNy ,a.addr ,a.addr_detail ,a.zip ,a.DelNy ,a.memberAddrLat ,a.memberAddrLng FROM memberAddr a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberAddr SET DelNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
